file_content.text: Commander, if you take out those artillery bunkers we can send Alliance air support onto the battlefield.
Brace yourself, Commander. General Rike is sending in reinforcements.
Look to the skies, Commander--enemy air support coming your way!
Get ready for another wave, Commander. This time Rike's sending in air support and ground troops!
With those artillery bunkers out of the way, we can send in Alliance air support. Just give the word when you want the bombs to start falling!
These mines belong to the Republic--your Alliance stole them. But what else could I expect from your kind?
You've never faced firepower like this before!
Now you'll see what real Republic soldiers can do!
Impossible odds are no reason to surrender. To the death!
Even though I fall, others will rise against you...
My colleagues may be willing to make peace with the enemy. Some have even defected to your side. But I remain loyal to the Republic!
I will fight with everything I have to restore our former glory... including this prototype hover tank. Ha ha! Bey'wan didn't warn you about that, did he?
